data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Fantasy Generator - Armor Parts Set
data.detailed_description:
【About】
“Fantasy Generator - Armor Parts Set” is a material pack for "RPG Maker MZ" featuring armor parts such as helmets, armor and robes by "Dot Picture Production Studio (Y-pot)", the creator of many of the default materials for "RPG Maker MZ".

Recommended for armor lovers and those looking to expand their default materials!

■An Enormous Assortment Over 90 parts for male and female!
The male version has a total of 95 parts, including 16 hats, 16 helmets, 15 outfits, 16 armor pieces, 16 robes, and 16 cloaks. The female version has 97 parts in total, including 17 hats, 16 helmets, 16 outfits, 16 armor pieces, 16 robes, and 16 cloaks.

You can create characters with a wide range of patterns by combining the parts!

Aside from the standard fantasy hero and spellcaster type of equipment (including elemental varieties such as such as fire, ice, thunder, wind, earth,
light, and darkness), there is also a set of samurai armor and stuffed-cat outfit available as a bonus! Combine them however you want to your taste!

■A style that match the default materials!

This pack was created by "Dot Picture Creation Studio," who created the default materials for "RPG Maker MZ." Since this set has the same taste and style as the default materials, it can be used together to create a unified world view, without feeling out of place!

■Compliments the separately sold "Shop Materials Tileset - Interior / Exterior."

Fantasy Generator - Armor Parts Set] is a collaboration with the separately sold DLC material collection “Shop Materials Tileset - Interior / Exterior”.

Clothing, armor, robes, helmets, hats, and capes from the "Shop Materials Tileset - Interior / Exterior" armor sheet have been created as materials for the generator.


Using both sets together will further expand your worldview creation!
=========================================================
Contents

▼Generator
・Accessory 2 / Male:32 / Female:33
・Cloak / Male:16 / Female:16
・Clothing / Male:47 / Female:48

=========================================================
